attributes.additional_details: Human rights should be for everyone, then why is there so many vunerable people in Britain and the world. Children especially babies are particularly at risk this has to stop. If a child is on the at risk register a closer eye should be kept on them, children brought up by know parents whom themselves are at risk should be made to be seem more often. Due to the present climate money and time are bigger factors than the at risk children. Please stop this now before another child dies of neglect.
